title: Commemorative Ribbon, "Fragments of commemorative ribbon for use as book mark", ca. 1876
medium: silk plain compound cloth brocaded with silks
dimensions:
Warp x Weft (a): 15 x 6.5 cm (5 7/8 x 2 9/16 in.)
Warp x Weft (b): 2.7 x 6.5 cm (1 1/16 x 2 9/16 in.)
description:
Ivory plain cloth ground with black silk secondary weft forming portrait of Columbus. Crossed flags of United States and Spain and the inscription: "Columbus" below portrait (B) at bottom in color: "Souvenir of the Discovery of America." At top, scene in black and ivory with the inscription: 
"Landing of Columbus Oct 12th 1492.

tombstone.epitaph: Commemorative Ribbon, "Fragments of commemorative ribbon for use as book mark", ca. 1876.silk plain compound cloth brocaded with silks. 1938-53-1-a,b.
